name: Stick World
description:
Stick World is an open-ended crime sandbox that won't hold your hand.

You have a singe goal. The rest is up to you.

 Everything can be achieved without killing anyone and with varying degrees of morality. Write your own story as you carve a path of destruction. Do whatever you want, legal or illegal. Violent or passive. Loyal or Backstabbing.

W-A-S-D to move, mouse to look

ESC - Return to Main Menu

R - Restart

F - Self Medicate

Numkeys/Scroll Wheel - Switch Weapons

*This game was in development off-and-on for 6 months. I decided to slap together what I had in one night and officially finish it so this game is a little bit unfinished. Such is life*
